# UIStatusBarAnimation.fade

**Case**

The status bar fades in and out as it is shown or hidden, respectively.

## Declaration

```swift
case fade
```

## Constants

- **UIStatusBarAnimation.none**: No animation is applied to the status bar as it is shown or hidden.
- **UIStatusBarAnimation.slide**: The status bar slides in or out as it is shown or hidden, respectively.
